features.name: Navigation Component
features.description: Responsive navigation bar with mobile menu toggle and smooth scrolling to sections

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Main landing section with animated text, CTA buttons, and gradient background

features.name: About Component
features.description: About section displaying personal information, skills overview, and profile image

features.name: Skills Showcase
features.description: Interactive skills section with animated progress bars and category organization

features.name: Projects Portfolio
features.description: Project showcase with image galleries, descriptions, and live/demo links

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Functional contact form with validation using React Hook Form and Supabase integration

features.name: Particle Background
features.description: Animated particle background effect for visual appeal

features.name: Cursor Trail Effect
features.description: Interactive cursor trail animation for enhanced user experience

features.name: Footer Component
features.description: Footer with navigation links, social media links, and copyright information

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Database and authentication services integration for contact form and user data

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive set of reusable UI components using Shadcn/UI and Radix UI

features.name: Routing System
features.description: Client-side routing setup with React Router for single-page application navigation

features.name: Custom Hooks
features.description: Reusable custom hooks for mobile detection and toast notifications

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Common utility functions for class name merging and styling

features.name: Styling System
features.description: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom styling and responsive design

features.name: Build Configuration
features.description: Vite build configuration with React SWC, path aliases, and development tools

features.name: Asset Management
features.description: Image assets and static files for portfolio content
